author: craigmcc
msg: Copy LICENSE.txt file we already have, instead of going to our parent
directory.  This makes building from source distros easier.

author: rdonkin
msg: Made RSS classes serializable so that they can be used more easily in middle tier applications (for example EJBs).

msg: Added support for call-param from stack to xml rules.. Enhancement requested as bug  #16413.

author: rdonkin
msg: Made sure that maven build includes DTD. Fixed bug #18302. Patch submitted by Joe Germuska.

msg: Test cases for optional no-propagation of factory create rule exceptions
